title.description: Scenario title. Try to include in it the lesson of the scenario

assistant_gender.description: Gender/sex of the assistant role. Choose either «male» or «female».

practice_topic.description: Target topic for practice (or «all» if unclear).

complete_description.description: Display text shown to the learner. ‘You’ = learner, ‘I’ = assistant. English only.

theme.description: One-line theme summary (e.g. “Ordering Food at a Spanish Restaurant”).

potential_directions.description: Five comma-separated avenues the dialog could take.

example.description: One-line sample exchange with no newline chars.

additional_data.description: Any important details that the user wants to add to the scenario. Must be as much as the user specifies.

items.description: The detail of the additional data.

appropriate.description: True if topic is safe for all ages; otherwise false.
